alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 12:26PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Lee, northwestern Clarendon and western Sumter Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Shaw Air Base to 7 miles southeast of Poinsett State Park. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumter, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Mulberry, Oakland, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Mayesville, Pinewood, Paxville, Cane Savannah, Oswego, Dalzell, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, Wedgewood, East Sumter, St. Charles and Cherryvale. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 125 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
